listing_company_name: R & R Rural & Residential Property - Stroud
description:
Nestled into the hillside in the picturesque Stroud Valley, sits this custom-built mud brick home. The private 56 acres, with a combination of cleared paddocks & natural bushland, is located only 10 minutes from the Stroud Village. This is an opportunity not to be missed!


Inside, the property boasts cathedral ceilings and exposed beams with an open plan layout across the living, kitchen, and dining areas. Cedar glass sliding doors invite you onto the wrap around verandahs and an alfresco deck capturing the views of the mountains and valley below.


The galley kitchen features a generous island bench, a 90cm gas cooktop, oven and rangehood, two separate sinks and a dishwasher plus a rustic slow-combustion stove.


The master wing has its own living area including a slow-combustion fireplace and reverse cycle air conditioning. The queen size bedroom leads to an ensuite with a feature claw foot bath! There are two additional queen bedrooms and a sitting room that include BIRs, ceiling fans and verandah access.


Additional highlights include, a generous hallway leading to the office, ceiling fans, S/C fireplace, NBN connection, 30 solar panels, multiple rainwater storage tanks, and 3 undercover carports.


External features include a 15m x 9m machinery shed with concrete floor and power connected. The land is fully fenced with post and wire and includes three dams.


This is the perfect property for a family wanting a tree change, hobby farmer, or a potential Airbnb! With vibrant Stroud Village with its primary school, cafes, shops, and services only minutes away, this property is certain to please. Proximity to the major regional centres of Gloucester (20mins), Raymond Terrace (35mins) and Newcastle (60mins) further enhances the property's overall appeal. Live the life you've always dreamed of!


Expressions of Interest Closing 7/10/22

For more information and to organise an inspection, please contact Rikki-Lee Day on 0427 658 146

DISCLAIMER: R & R Property makes no representations as to the accuracy of the information provided by our vendors. Interested parties should conduct their due diligence about each property they are considering purchasing. All photographs, maps and images are representative and for marketing purposes only.
